Package diceTools

Class DiceFileTools

java.lang.Object
diceTools.DiceFileTools
public class DiceFileTools
extends java.lang.Object
Provides methods to save and load key-value pairs in files.
Author:
kieran

  • Method Details

    • toFile

      public static <T> void toFile​(ProbMap<? extends T> pm, java.util.function.Function<T,​java.lang.String> saveFunc, java.io.File f) throws java.io.IOException
      Save the contents of a ProbMap to a file
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the keys accepted by the save Function
      Parameters:
      pm - ProbMap containing the key-value pairs to be saved
      saveFunc - Function defining the rule by which keys are converted to Strings
      f - File to which the data is saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs while saving the data

    • toFile

      public static <T> void toFile​(java.lang.Iterable<? extends java.util.Map.Entry<? extends T,​java.lang.Double>> iter, java.util.function.Function<T,​java.lang.String> saveFunc, java.io.File f) throws java.io.IOException
      Save the contents of an Iterable of Map.Entrys to a file
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the keys of the Map.Entrys
      Parameters:
      iter - Iterable for which each entry is to be saved
      saveFunc - Function defining the rule by which keys are converted to Strings
      f - File to which the data is saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs while saving the data
